text: Suturoni qurʙoniro ʙaroi sumo az siorhoi Xudo qaror dodem. Sumoro dar on xajrest. Va hamcunon ki ʙar poj istodaand, nomi Xudoro ʙar onho ʙixoned va cun pahlujason ʙar zamin rasid, az onho ʙixured va faqironro qone'u gadojonro ta'om dihed. Inhoro ʙaroi sumo rom kardem. Bosad, ki sukrguzori kuned
